name: elevatorsaga.ts
description: Elevator Saga - The elevator programming game
//_1: Note that `npm run-script build` is best ran with NODE_ENV=development, in my experience
//_2: Also each rootish monaco file must be listed here so it has a dependable path. If adjusting, edits may need to be made in `ts/editors/monaco.ts`
//_3: `npx parcel watch` doesn't have --no-minify and it breaks without it so... use build instead.

scripts.watch: npx parcel watch index.html documentation.html test/index.html node_modules/monaco-editor/esm/vs/language/json/json.worker.js node_modules/monaco-editor/esm/vs/language/css/css.worker.js node_modules/monaco-editor/esm/vs/language/html/html.worker.js node_modules/monaco-editor/esm/vs/language/typescript/ts.worker.js node_modules/monaco-editor/esm/vs/editor/editor.worker.js
scripts.build: npx parcel build --no-minify index.html documentation.html test/index.html node_modules/monaco-editor/esm/vs/language/json/json.worker.js node_modules/monaco-editor/esm/vs/language/css/css.worker.js node_modules/monaco-editor/esm/vs/language/html/html.worker.js node_modules/monaco-editor/esm/vs/language/typescript/ts.worker.js node_modules/monaco-editor/esm/vs/editor/editor.worker.js
